summary: 08 AZERA:  AIR BAG LIGHT COMES ON ALONG WITH PASSENGER SEATBELT WARNING.  FIRST WOULD OCCUR INTERMITTENTLY 2 YRS AGO BUT FOR MORE THAN A WEEK THE AIRBAG LIGHT WOULD STAYS ON (EVEN WHEN A PASSENGER IS SEATED OR NOT).   HAD DEALER LOOK AT IT (WHEN IT WAS ON) & THEY INDICATED  IT IS THE PASSENGER SEAT BELT / WIRING HARNESS ISSUE THEY'VE BEEN REPLACING UNDER A RECALL.  INDICATED THE CAR'S VIN DIDN'T APPEAR IN RECALL BUT SERVICE REP. SAID IT APPEARS TO BE THE EXACT SAME ISSUE.  HAD REPLACED. NOW IT IS OCCURRING AGAIN.  REQUESTING HYUNDAI CORPORATE REVIEW AND APPROVE REPAIR AT NO CHARGE.  CONCERNED FOR OUR SAFETY.
